gameCore

Class Weapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameCore.Item
      • gameCore.Weapon

  • public class Weapon
extends Item
    A Weapon is a type of item that has an attack to increase the character's attack value.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Group D, Main author: Karen Madore Group D Members --------------- Karen Madore Trang Pham Darrell Penner
